subject: Dear
body:
Dear
I'm happy to inform you about my success in getting your funds
transferred under the cooperation of a new partner from Paraguay in
the person of Mr. Santos Da Silva Mendes. Presently I’m in the
hospital diagnosed with cancer but feeling a lot better because now I
know my heart’s desire has been accomplished.
Meanwhile, I didn’t forget your past efforts and attempts to receive
restitution payment due to you. I need you to contact my secretary in
The UK, her name is; Judith Butler and her email address
judithbutler667@gmail.com
I asked him to send you a total of GBP500,000.00 (Five  Hundred and
Pounds Sterling) Certified bank draft which was raised with HSBC
(London) in your favor  for your compensations and  all the past
attempts to assist in this overdue payment process . I sincerely
appreciate your efforts at that time very much, so feel free to get in
touch with my secretary Tricia Porter  and re- confirm your address
where she will send the draft to you via special post-delivery to your
given address.
At the moment, I’m still at the hospital and won’t have time to
communicate frequently, remember that I have forwarded instructions to
my secretary on your behalf to send out the Draft to you, so feel free
to get in touch with Tricia without any delay.
I promise to call you as soon as I settle down and my health permits me.
Thank you for your understanding and bye for now, please do forgive me
for the delay in sending out your compensations
Yours Truly,
Graham Tyler Chambers & Co.
Hardman Square,
Spinning fields,
Manchester M3 3EB

subject: Re:   Dear
body:
Dear Graham Tyler Chambers Co.,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this information. I'm glad to hear about your success in getting my funds through your new partner. I hope Mr. Santos Da Silva Mendes recovers from his illness soon.

I appreciate that you haven't forgotten my past efforts and attempts to receive the payment due to me. It's kind of you to arrange for a certified bank draft in my favor. Could you please provide more details about how I can contact your secretary, Judith Butler? I would like to confirm my address and ensure that the draft is sent securely.

I understand that you're currently at the hospital and may not have much time, but I will make sure to get in touch with Tricia Porter as soon as possible. Please take care of yourself and focus on your health.

Thank you again for your assistance, and I look forward to hearing from your secretary soon.

Best wishes,
Norman
